full_text: Cardinal Zen has long been a thorn in the Chinese Communist Party’s side and called the Vatican’s relations with China “blatantly evil”. His detention shocked the city https://t.co/TW2Lx60WFb

localize.full_text: ゼン枢機卿は長年、中国共産党のとげとげしい存在で、バチカンの中国との関係を「あからさまな悪」と呼んでいた。彼の拘束は市内に衝撃を与えた https://t.co/TW2Lx60WFb
